biotools.summary: This tool refines an original hidden Markov model (HMM) to find an optimal fit against the evolutionary group that the HMM models, and it does this using through iterative database searches and incremental subsequent adaptation of the seed set.

bioschemas.name: RefineHMM
bioschemas.summary: This tool refines an original hidden Markov model (HMM) to find an optimal fit against the evolutionary group that the HMM models, and it does this using through iterative database searches and incremental subsequent adaptation of the seed set.
